data: RC Residential Care Comfort / End of Life Care
T;N, Nurse may inform family of resident's death
Notify attending provider of resident's death during regular hours
Notify attending provider at time of death
Discontinue routine vital signs, suctioning, oxygen saturation, glucometer, weight monitoring and intake/output
Consider discussion with substitute decision maker to ensure understanding of rationale for treatment
q4h, PRN and artificial saliva PRN for dry mouth
Indwelling, PRN, for urinary retention and/or comfort
PRN, for urinary retention and/or comfort
Consider maintaining parenteral access for medications and treatments that provide comfort
T;N, PRN for medications if unable to tolerate oral route
Consider reviewing all medications, including those that promote comfort and discontinue any that do not meet resident's goals of care
